name: Heart Breaker: A Secret Art Show Fan Game
name_original: Heart Breaker: A Secret Art Show Fan Game
description:
This is a pretty standard block breaker made in Unity, with the added step of using handpainted art assets from my favorite painter. :)

Gameplay is pretty basic as yet. There's no mechanic to obtain extra lives, but it is possible to catch the ball when it drops to add some color.

If playing on mobile, make sure to be in landscape mode before running it. The game only functions in landscape and I haven't worked out automatically changing to it yet. If on an iPhone, I'd recommend trying this in Chrome rather than Safari.

(I'm aware this is all a little clunky, but will be addressing that as I am able.)
